```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```



```{r}
demo_df = read_csv("./data/nhanes_covar.csv", 
                   na = "NA", 
                   skip = 4) |> 
  janitor::clean_names()


mims_df = read_csv("./data/nhanes_accel.csv", 
                   na = "NA",
                   ) |> 
  mutate(across(min1:min1440, as.double)) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = min1:min1440,
    names_to = "interval", 
    values_to = "mims"
  )

acce_df = left_join(mims_df, demo_df, by = "seqn")
```
